meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall and via video conference

agenda_items.title: Approval of the March 26, 2024, Charter Review Commission Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Prohibit the creation of jobs exempt from Civil Service in Chapter XVI
Amend Chapter III §13(b) to allow each council committee to elect their own chairs and vice chairs
Require that the mayor receive two councilmember co-sponsors for board and commission chair appointments
Authorize a limited power of veto for the mayor with a city council override of a two-thirds vote
agenda_items.description: Authorize the mayor to exercise veto power over city council action calling a special election for the purpose of authorizing general obligation bonds, with a city council override of a two-thirds vote. Authorize the mayor to exercise veto power over the annual city budget.

agenda_items.title: Require the city manager to seek and obtain the city council’s policy priorities before submitting the city manager’s annual budget
agenda_items.description: Require the city manager’s annual budget to reflect those priorities.

agenda_items.title: Establish an Office of Ombudsman within the function of the city auditor
Clarify that city council’s appointments to boards and commissions are at-will
Delete Chapter III §15 prohibiting city council from interfering with appointments or subordinates of city manager
Require appointees to boards and commissions to reside in the council district of the nominating councilmember
agenda_items.description: While allowing for a 2/3 vote non-district exception.

agenda_items.title: Change wording in the charter to be more inclusive
agenda_items.description: Using 'resident' or 'people' in place of citizen.

agenda_items.title: Amend the vote requirement for council to modify the redistricting commission’s recommended districting plan
agenda_items.description: From a 3/4 majority vote to a 2/3 majority vote in Chapter IV §5(b)(6).

agenda_items.title: Amend Chapter IV §5 to add eligibility criteria for serving on the redistricting commission
